docs.title: GW2ChatLinks
docs.text:
GW2ChatLinks is a Kotlin multiplatform library for de- and encoding Guild Wars 2 chat links.

The library is fully written in common Kotlin code. Prebuilt binaries are available for JVM (Java 11 or later), JS, Wasm, and all native targets.1

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: Return values are wrapped in Result objects for convenient error handling.

docs.title: Encoding chat links
docs.text:
A ChatLink object may be encoded into a string using the encodeChatLink function.

val chatLink: Result<String> = encodeChatLink(ChatLink.Coin(amount = 10203u))
assertEquals("[&AdsnAAA=]", chatLink.getOrThrow())

docs.title: Decoding chat links
docs.text:
A ChatLink object may be decoded from a string using the decodeChatLink function.

val chatLink: Result<ChatLink> = decodeChatLink("[&AdsnAAA=]")
assertEquals(ChatLink.Coin(amount = 10203u), chatLink.getOrThrow())

  1. Since this library does not rely on any platform-specific APIs, we aim to provide prebuilt libraries for all native targets supported by Kotlin. Despite that, some targets may be missing as target support may change over time. In case something is missing, please make sure to let us know. ↩
